name: Red Bell Peppers
properties: Part of Daily Dozen - vegetables category
Contains nicotine-like compounds that boost AMPK
Rich in vitamin C, beta-carotene, and antioxidants
benefits: Red bell peppers contain approximately 92% water and are highlighted in the cookbook as aboveground vegetables highest on the water scale. They contain beneficial nicotine-like compounds that may activate AMPK for enhanced fat burning. Raw red peppers offer maximum orosensory stimulation which can slow eating rate and enhance satiety signals.
amount: 1 red pepper, de-seeded and chopped or thinly sliced

quotes: Peppers have that nicotine edge I described in Amping AMPK, and uncooked vegetables in general offer more orosensory stimulation.
1 red pepper, de-seeded and thinly sliced
